target_patch.description: The sound direction for this 90-second clip is a fusion of dramatic hip hop and classical music, creating a unique and compelling auditory experience. The music is designed to enhance the futuristic and energetic atmosphere of the sport, with powerful beats and orchestral elements that underscore the intensity of the gameplay. The hip hop influences bring a modern, urban edge, while the classical components add a layer of sophistication and depth. This combination not only complements the visual spectacle of men in rollerblades with helmets and spiked gloves but also elevates the overall dramatic tension, making the soundscape both distinctive and memorable.
